trans-unit.source: Provides properties that define the visual appearance of the axis labels.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于定义轴标签可视外观的属性。

trans-unit.source: Members of this class are also used to calculate the intervals and positions of the axis labels, and to draw them.
trans-unit.target: 此类的成员还用于计算间隔和轴标签的位置，以及以绘制它们。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelStyle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelStyle" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the angle at which the font is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示绘制字体所用的角度。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="integer" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="False" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="True" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelStyle" /> 占用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the label is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志指示是否启用了标签。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the label is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了标签，则为 <see langword="True" />；否则为 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the label.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签的字体。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the label.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formatting string for the label text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签文本的格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="string" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the label interval.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签间隔的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="double" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="double" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not set by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset of the label interval.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签间隔的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="double" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="double" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not set by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement of the label interval offset.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签间隔偏移量的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not set by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the size of a label interval.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签间隔大小的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not set by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether the labels are shown at axis ends.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定是否在轴的末尾显示标签。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the labels are shown at axis ends; otherwise, <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在轴的末尾显示标签，则为 <see langword="True" />；否则为 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether the labels are shown with an offset.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定标签是否显示为带有偏移量。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the labels are shown with an offset; otherwise, <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果标签显示为带有偏移量，则为 <see langword="True" />；否则为 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether the labels can be truncated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定标签是否可以截断。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the labels can be truncated; otherwise, <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果标签可以截断，则为 <see langword="True" />；否则为 <see langword="False" />。
